import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";
import RequestSchema from "@theme/RequestSchema";
import StatusCodes from "@theme/StatusCodes";
import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";

import Heading from "@theme/Heading";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Remove asset from favorites"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/assets/favorites/remove/{assetId}/{userId}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Removes an asset from a user's favorites collection. The asset will no longer appear in quick-access views or ticket shortcuts for that user.

**Prerequisites**
1. **assetId** - Call [GET /api/v1.0/assets/favorites/\{userId\}](/docs/api/assets/get-user-favorite-assets) to view current favorites and select the `AssetId` to remove.
2. **userId** - Call [POST /api/v1.0/search](/docs/api/search/global-search) with the user identifier and capture `Item.Users[].UserId`.

**Workflow Example**
1. List user's favorites: [GET /api/v1.0/assets/favorites/\{userId\}](/docs/api/assets/get-user-favorite-assets) to see current favorites.
2. Call [POST /api/v1.0/assets/favorites/remove/\{assetId\}/\{userId\}](/docs/api/assets/remove-asset-favorite) to remove the selected asset.

**Minimal Required Fields**
- `assetId` (path) - The asset to remove from favorites.
- `userId` (path) - The user whose favorite list is being updated.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"assetId","in":"path","required":true,"description":"UUID of the asset to remove from favorites. Obtain with POST /api/v1.0/search and read `Item.Users[].UserId`.","example":"11111111-1111-4111-8111-111111111111","x-obtained-from":{"operationId":"searchUsers","endpoint":"POST /api/v1.0/search","responseField":"Item.Users[].UserId"},"schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}

</RequestSchema>
